title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, January 2, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of science fiction writer Isaac Asimov, born Petrovichi, Russia in 1920. He would be turning 100 today if he were still alive.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of science fiction writer Isaac Asimov, born Petrovichi, Russia in 1920. He would be turning 100 today if he were still alive.
